short_description.en: $0.70 / sqft rebate (not to exceed $1,000 per home) for wall insulation

equipment_standards_restrictions: Wall insulation ≥ R-13 (2x4 framing) or ≥ R-19 (2x6 framing)
contractor_restrictions:
Must work with a BayREN Participating Contractor 

To get started, contact your Home Energy Advisor for information about qualifying projects. Then hire a BayREN Participating Contractor and get your project started!
other_restrictions: Customer must not have previously received a rebate for the same product or equipment from more than one energy-efficiency program offering rebates, financing or other rebates funded with PG&E ratepayer dollars within the past three years for O&M measures and eight years for building shell, HVAC and water heating measures.
bonus_description: $100 bonus rebate for Combustion Appliance Safety (CAS) test-out
stacking_details:
Rebates are capped at $4,000 per eligible customer over an eight-year period. Individual measure rebates may not exceed the measure cost.

One rebate is offered per measure per address.

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

short_description.en: Get $250 back on your high efficiency heat pump clothes dryer when replacing an existing natural gas clothes dryer.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Heat pump clothes dryer ≥ 4.50 Combined Energy Factor (CEF) (must replace existing natural gas clothes dryer and listed as ENERGY STAR Efficient heat pump clothes dryer)
other_restrictions: *Customer must not have previously received a rebate for the same product or equipment from more than one energy-efficiency program offering rebates, financing or other rebates funded with PG&E ratepayer dollars within the past three years for O&M measures and eight years for building shell, HVAC and water heating measures.
stacking_details:
Rebates are capped at $4,000 per eligible customer over an eight-year period. Individual measure rebates may not exceed the measure cost.

One rebate is offered per measure per address.

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values
